name: LocoMotives
description: LocoMotives(TM) is a family fun game, set in the Old West when constructing railroads was the adventure! Play the role of a Wild West Rail Baron and be the first to connect your rail line from the harbor to the new frontier! Beware of Bandits, Thieves, Destroyers  - bad men and women of every ilk abound!  Sheriffs and Marshals are there to keep the peace, but conflict can break out at any moment, ending in a Showdown!  Get your track built across the river and to the Station first and your the winner!
